languages.text: "Это утверждение ложно, слова моего наставника звучат как ересь. Пределы дозволенного были установлены потому, что за ними таится опасность. Каждый шаг за них может обернуться кровавыми жертвами — но благословенного Амарната они не пугали".

traits.locale_text: "Это утверждение ложно, слова моего наставника звучат как ересь. Пределы дозволенного были установлены потому, что за ними таится опасность. Каждый шаг за них может обернуться кровавыми жертвами — но благословенного Амарната они не пугали".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение ложно, слова моего наставника звучат как ересь. Пределы дозволенного были установлены потому, что за ними таится опасность. Каждый шаг за них может обернуться кровавыми жертвами — но благословенного Амарната они не пугали".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false, my mentor's words sound like heresy. The limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them may lead to a bloody sacrifice — but blessed Amarnat was not afraid."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false, my mentor's words sound like heresy. The limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them may lead to a bloody sacrifice — but blessed Amarnat was not afraid."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的，我的导师的话听起来更像是异端邪说。之所以会存在那些限制，是因为一旦超过限制，就可能会导致危险。每向外走一步，都可能会导致一场血腥的屠杀，但蒙福者阿玛纳特并不惧怕这些。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的，我的导师的话听起来更像是异端邪说。之所以会存在那些限制，是因为一旦超过限制，就可能会导致危险。每向外走一步，都可能会导致一场血腥的屠杀，但蒙福者阿玛纳特并不惧怕这些。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Las palabras de mi mentor suenan a herejía. Los límites se establecen porque ir más allá puede resultar peligroso. Cada paso a partir de ellos puede desencadenar una masacre, pero el bendito Amarnat no tenía miedo».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Las palabras de mi mentor suenan a herejía. Los límites se establecen porque ir más allá puede resultar peligroso. Cada paso a partir de ellos puede desencadenar una masacre, pero el bendito Amarnat no tenía miedo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この発言は偽り…我が師の言葉は異端に聞こえる。限界というのは、それを超えるのは危険だから設けられたものだ。その限界を越える一歩一歩が血なまぐさい虐殺につながりかねない。しかし、祝福されしアマルナトは恐れていなかった」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."

traits.locale_text: 「この発言は偽り…我が師の言葉は異端に聞こえる。限界というのは、それを超えるのは危険だから設けられたものだ。その限界を越える一歩一歩が血なまぐさい虐殺につながりかねない。しかし、祝福されしアマルナトは恐れていなかった」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch — die Worte meines Mentors klingen nach Ketzerei. Grenzen wurden implementiert, weil es gefährlich ist, über sie hinauszugehen. Jeder Schritt darüber hinaus könnte zu einem blutigen Gemetzel führen, doch der gesegnete Amarnat hatte keine Angst."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch — die Worte meines Mentors klingen nach Ketzerei. Grenzen wurden implementiert, weil es gefährlich ist, über sie hinauszugehen. Jeder Schritt darüber hinaus könnte zu einem blutigen Gemetzel führen, doch der gesegnete Amarnat hatte keine Angst."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Négatif, les paroles de mon mentor ont tout d'une hérésie. Si des limites ont été établies, c'est parce qu'il est dangereux de s'aventurer au-delà. Chaque pas les dépassant pourrait causer une hécatombe, mais Amarnat le béni n'avait peur de rien. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."

traits.locale_text: « Négatif, les paroles de mon mentor ont tout d'une hérésie. Si des limites ont été établies, c'est parce qu'il est dangereux de s'aventurer au-delà. Chaque pas les dépassant pourrait causer une hécatombe, mais Amarnat le béni n'avait peur de rien. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Yönderimin sözleri kâfirlikten farksızdır. Sınırların konulma nedeni, ötelerine geçmenin tehlikeli olmasıdır. Ötelerine doğru atılan her bir adım, kanlı bir katliama yol açabilir. Kutsanmış Amarnat ise bunlardan korkmuyordu."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false — my mentor's words sound like heresy. Limits were established because it is dangerous to venture beyond. Each step past them could lead to a bloody slaughter, but the blessed Amarnat was not afraid."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış, yönderimin sözleri kâfirlikten farksız. Sınırların konulma nedeni, ötelerine geçmenin tehlikeli olmasıdır. Ötelerine doğru atılan her bir adım, kanlı bir katliama yol açabilir ama kutsanmış Amarnat bunlardan korkmuyordu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
